member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Application.AppId
member.summary: The AppId of the application created by AppDev

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Application.UIConfigurationUrl
member.summary: Third-party url which hosts form for configuring the app and contained capabilities

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Application.IsExtension
member.summary: denotes if the Application is an extension

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Application.Initialized
member.summary: denotes if the application has been initialized, to be set by the third party capability after the UIConfiguration form located at the UIConfigurationUrl has been submitted.

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Application.Enabled
member.summary: denotes if the Application is enabled, may only be set by the merchant

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Capability.CapabilityMode
member.summary: the mode of the capability, typically readonly

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Capability.ScopeType
member.summary: The scope at which this exists: "Tenant", "MasterCatalog", "Site"

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Capability.ScopeId
member.summary: The id of the particular scope

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Capability.Initialized
member.summary: denotes if the capability is initialized, to be set by ThirdParty

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Capability.Enabled
member.summary: denotes if the capability is enabled, to be set by SiteBuilder. Cannot be true if Initialized is false

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Capability.OperationUrls
member.summary: The external endpoint implemented for each capability operation to call

member.summary: Third-party url which hosts form for configuring the app and contained capabilities

member.summary: denotes if the Application is an extension

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Internal.Application.Entitlement
member.summary: The entitlement record associated with this application. READ-ONLY and should not be exposed to third-parties

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Internal.Application.Initialized
member.summary: denotes if the application has been initialized, to be set by the third party capability after the UIConfiguration form located at the UIConfigurationUrl has been submitted.

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Internal.Application.HashKey
member.summary: The hashkey of the application. Used in the signing of outbound calls to the thirdparty implementation. READ-ONLY

member.name: P:Mozu.InstalledApplications.Contracts.Internal.Application.Enabled
member.summary: denotes if the Application is enabled, may only be set by the merchant
